Action.author: tsharris
Action.body: ~caod Should we implement the SetKafkaBrokers() as a legacy option or exclude entirely?

Action.author: caod
Action.body: Let's exclude it, just like how top level orderer addresses are deprecated and we don't support setting/updating but rather just removing.

Action.author: tsharris
Action.body: https://github.com/stephyee/fabric-config/tree/fab-18062 has my current work but needs to be polished.
